Great Game... Yes this is for a badge requirement...
Still my first and best FPS game of all times

Half-Life is starting point to one of my favorite franchises, and is a very unique game.

In the 90's, many FPS games sacrificed story for fast-paced gameplay, leading to the market being oversaturated with Doom clones. (Some of them were good though.)

Half-Life turns this around by having the pace shift at any moment,  with calmer vent segments, to the adrenaline pumping marine ambushes. You play as a scientist, not a demon slaying space soldier, and this means you really have to think and weigh your options in your head quickly before making your next move.

Great game.
I'm only reviewing this because I have nominated it for the Game of the Year Award.
